desc: List all of the owners on a given workspace.

token.desc: Authentication token bearing required scopes. Tokens should be passed as an HTTP Authorization header or alternatively, as a POST parameter.

limit.desc: The maximum number of items to return. Must be between 1 - 1000 both inclusive.

cursor.desc: Set `cursor` to `next_cursor` returned by the previous call to list items in the next page.

feature_not_enabled.desc: The Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this team.

invalid_auth.desc: The given token is not authorized for the requested team.

not_an_admin.desc: This method is only accessible by org owners and admins.
